title: Prosecutors seek 20-year sentence for main accused Dominique Pelicot in France mass rape case
content: French prosecutors sought a 20-year sentence for Dominique Pelicot, accused of drugging and facilitating the rape of his wife by dozens of men. The trial, involving 50 defendants, concluded arguments amidst national protests against gender-based violence. Pelicot confessed to the crimes, while many defendants claimed they believed the acts were consensual.
summary: French prosecutors sought a 20-year sentence for Dominique Pelicot, accused of drugging and facilitating the rape of his wife by dozens of men. The trial, involving 50 defendants, concluded arguments amidst national protests against gender-based violence. Pelicot confessed to the crimes, while many defendants claimed they believed the acts were consensual.

title: Putin signs law forgiving debt arrears for new Russian recruits for Ukraine war
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law forgiving up to $95,835 in debt for new army recruits who sign at least one-year contracts to fight in Ukraine. This measure, effective from December 1st, aims to boost military recruitment without resorting to another general mobilization, as Russia grapples with increasing consumer debt among its citizens amidst the ongoing conflict.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a law forgiving up to $95,835 in debt for new army recruits who sign at least one-year contracts to fight in Ukraine. This measure, effective from December 1st, aims to boost military recruitment without resorting to another general mobilization, as Russia grapples with increasing consumer debt among its citizens amidst the ongoing conflict.

title: King Charles and Queen Camilla set to embark on journey to India: Report
content: King Charles III, while continuing his cancer recovery, is planning a major tour of South Asia in 2024, including India, Pakistan, and Bangladesh. This follows a successful trip to Australia and Samoa and signifies a return to extensive international travel for the monarch. The tour holds significant political and cultural importance for Britain.
summary: King Charles III, while continuing his cancer recovery, is planning a major tour of South Asia in 2024, including India, Pakistan, and Bangladesh.  This follows a successful trip to Australia and Samoa and signifies a return to extensive international travel for the monarch. The tour holds significant political and cultural importance for Britain.

title: Watch: Opposition lawmakers clash with Serbian government during Parliament session
content: A brawl erupted in Serbia's parliament after opposition lawmakers accused the ruling party of responsibility for a deadly train station roof collapse. Opposition members displayed accusatory banners and chanted "killers," leading to physical altercations with the ruling coalition. The opposition demands accountability for the tragedy, including the prime minister's resignation, amidst accusations of corruption and delayed action.
summary: A brawl erupted in Serbia's parliament after opposition lawmakers accused the ruling party of responsibility for a deadly train station roof collapse.  Opposition members displayed accusatory banners and chanted "killers," leading to physical altercations with the ruling coalition.  The opposition demands accountability for the tragedy, including the prime minister's resignation, amidst accusations of corruption and delayed action.

title: Hong Kong court grants housing and inheritance rights to same-sex couples
content: Hong Kong's highest court has delivered a landmark victory for LGBTQ+ rights, affirming same-sex couples' housing and inheritance rights. The court ruled against government appeals, deeming the exclusion of same-sex couples from public housing and inheritance laws discriminatory.
summary: Hong Kong's highest court has delivered a landmark victory for LGBTQ+ rights, affirming same-sex couples' housing and inheritance rights. The court ruled against government appeals, deeming the exclusion of same-sex couples from public housing and inheritance laws discriminatory.

title: 'Bullet with bullet': Imran Khan supporters break lockdown in Islamabad
content: Thousands of supporters of jailed former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan clashed with police in Islamabad, defying a government ban and demanding his release. Security forces responded with tear gas and rubber bullets, resulting in casualties and injuries. The US urged restraint and respect for human rights. Over 4,000 Khan supporters were arrested, and internet services were disrupted.
summary: Thousands of supporters of jailed former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan clashed with police in Islamabad, defying a government ban and demanding his release.  Security forces responded with tear gas and rubber bullets, resulting in casualties and injuries.  The US urged restraint and respect for human rights.  Over 4,000 Khan supporters were arrested, and internet services were disrupted.

title: 'Price of fentanyl will rise sharply': Elon Musk on Trump’s tariff crackdown
content: President-elect Trump announced plans to impose tariffs on goods from China, Mexico, and Canada to combat illegal immigration and drug trafficking. He proposes a 25% tariff on Mexican and Canadian imports and an additional 10% on Chinese goods. Trump cited the influx of drugs and crime and accused China of failing to curb fentanyl production.
summary: President-elect Trump announced plans to impose tariffs on goods from China, Mexico, and Canada to combat illegal immigration and drug trafficking. He proposes a 25% tariff on Mexican and Canadian imports and an additional 10% on Chinese goods. Trump cited the influx of drugs and crime and accused China of failing to curb fentanyl production.

title: 'You better start packing now': Trump’s border czar Tom Homan unveils tough deportation plan
content: Tom Homan, Trump's appointed border czar, is preparing a comprehensive deportation plan prioritizing the removal of illegal immigrants, many of whom he says should have been deported under previous administrations. Homan's plan contrasts sharply with the Biden administration's approach, which has seen record illegal border crossings.
summary: Tom Homan, Trump's appointed border czar, is preparing a comprehensive deportation plan prioritizing the removal of illegal immigrants, many of whom he says should have been deported under previous administrations. Homan's plan contrasts sharply with the Biden administration's approach, which has seen record illegal border crossings.

title: Why hundreds of Pakistanis are ready to 'do or die' for jailed ex-PM Imran Khan?
content: Supporters of jailed ex-PM Imran Khan march on Islamabad, protesting against the Shehbaz Sharif government and demanding Khan's release. The government vows to suppress the protests, while the US urges restraint from both sides. Controversy surrounds Khan's wife, Bushra Bibi, over statements allegedly critical of Saudi Arabia, which Khan denies.
summary: Supporters of jailed ex-PM Imran Khan march on Islamabad, protesting against the Shehbaz Sharif government and demanding Khan's release.  The government vows to suppress the protests, while the US urges restraint from both sides.  Controversy surrounds Khan's wife, Bushra Bibi, over statements allegedly critical of Saudi Arabia, which Khan denies.

title: Pilot and rescue dog killed in remote woods in New York; two dogs survive
content: A pilot and a rescue dog perished in a small plane crash in the snowy Catskill Mountains while transporting three dogs from Maryland to Albany. Two other dogs survived the crash. Pilot Seuk Kim, a volunteer known for his dedication to animal rescue, encountered poor visibility and turbulence before the crash.
summary: A pilot and a rescue dog perished in a small plane crash in the snowy Catskill Mountains while transporting three dogs from Maryland to Albany. Two other dogs survived the crash. Pilot Seuk Kim, a volunteer known for his dedication to animal rescue, encountered poor visibility and turbulence before the crash.

title: Bitcoin millionaire hides $2m treasure across US in five chests filled with gold, gems and rare cards
content: A Bitcoin investor, Jon Collins-Black, has concealed five treasure chests worth over $2 million across the US. His book, "There's Treasure Inside," provides clues to their locations. The chests contain diverse items, from ancient coins to a Bitcoin, and are hidden in safe, accessible public places. Collins-Black hopes to inspire adventure and curiosity with this real-life treasure hunt.
summary: A Bitcoin investor, Jon Collins-Black, has concealed five treasure chests worth over $2 million across the US. His book, "There's Treasure Inside," provides clues to their locations.  The chests contain diverse items, from ancient coins to a Bitcoin, and are hidden in safe, accessible public places. Collins-Black hopes to inspire adventure and curiosity with this real-life treasure hunt.

title: ‘I never intended to kill anyone’: Florida woman sentenced to 25 years for shooting black neighbour dead
content: A Florida woman was sentenced to 25 years for killing her neighbour. The two women argued over children playing near the woman's home. The woman shot her neighbour through the door. She claimed self-defence but was found guilty of manslaughter. The victim's family mourned their loss. The judge called the shooting unnecessary. The woman expressed regret in court.
summary: A Florida woman was sentenced to 25 years for killing her neighbour.  The two women argued over children playing near the woman's home. The woman shot her neighbour through the door.  She claimed self-defence but was found guilty of manslaughter. The victim's family mourned their loss. The judge called the shooting unnecessary. The woman expressed regret in court.

title: Watch: Japan rocket site gutted in fire, test halted
content: An engine combustion test for Japan's Epsilon S rocket was suspended after a fire erupted at the Tanegashima Space Center. The incident is under investigation. The Epsilon S, a next-generation small rocket, was scheduled for its debut flight by March but has faced previous delays, including an engine test failure 16 months ago.
summary: An engine combustion test for Japan's Epsilon S rocket was suspended after a fire erupted at the Tanegashima Space Center.  The incident is under investigation. The Epsilon S, a next-generation small rocket, was scheduled for its debut flight by March but has faced previous delays, including an engine test failure 16 months ago.

title: 'Will just get pilots killed': Elon Musk suggests fighter jets be replaced by drones
content: Elon Musk criticized manned fighter jets, especially the F-35, as obsolete, advocating for drones. He called the F-35 expensive and flawed, while a researcher defended its strategic importance, highlighting its advanced technology and impact on geopolitical rivals.
summary: Elon Musk criticized manned fighter jets, especially the F-35, as obsolete, advocating for drones. He called the F-35 expensive and flawed, while a researcher defended its strategic importance, highlighting its advanced technology and impact on geopolitical rivals.

title: Mike Waltz to resign for national security role as Trump pushes Florida lawmakers to run for Congress
content: Florida Representative Mike Waltz will resign from Congress on January 20 to become Trump's national security adviser. Special elections will be held to fill his and other vacant seats, narrowing the House Republican majority. Trump has endorsed candidates for the upcoming races, including Randy Fine for the 6th District.
summary: Florida Representative Mike Waltz will resign from Congress on January 20 to become Trump's national security adviser.  Special elections will be held to fill his and other vacant seats, narrowing the House Republican majority. Trump has endorsed candidates for the upcoming races, including Randy Fine for the 6th District.

title: 'RUN, JIMMY, RUN!': Trump backs Jimmy Patronis to replace Matt Gaetz’s seat in Congress
content: Former Florida CFO Jimmy Patronis has resigned from his position and announced his candidacy for Florida's 1st Congressional District seat following an endorsement from Donald Trump. This comes after Matt Gaetz's resignation amidst allegations of sexual misconduct and a federal investigation. The special election primary is scheduled for January 28, with the final election on April 1.
summary: Former Florida CFO Jimmy Patronis has resigned from his position and announced his candidacy for Florida's 1st Congressional District seat following an endorsement from Donald Trump. This comes after Matt Gaetz's resignation amidst allegations of sexual misconduct and a federal investigation. The special election primary is scheduled for January 28, with the final election on April 1.

title: Kash Patel's name being finalized for either FBI or Justice Department despite possible backlash
content: Patel has openly discussed retaliation against Trump's political enemies in government and media, and wrote in his book: "[T]he FBI has become so thoroughly compromised that it will remain a threat to the people unless drastic measures are taken." Axios reported that the final decision on Kash Patel has not been made and Trump could still change his mind and make Patel all the way to FBI director which may send shockwaves similar to the nomination of Matt Gaetz as the attorney general which eventually Gatez had to withdraw.
summary: Patel has openly discussed retaliation against Trump's political enemies in government and media, and wrote in his book: "[T]he FBI has become so thoroughly compromised that it will remain a threat to the people unless drastic measures are taken." Axios reported that the final decision on Kash Patel has not been made and Trump could still change his mind and make Patel all the way to FBI director which may send shockwaves similar to the nomination of Matt Gaetz as the attorney general which eventually Gatez had to withdraw.

title: Diddy's Thanksgiving meal in jail revealed after his private island plea got rejected
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs will spend Thanksgiving in Brooklyn's Metropolitan Detention Center after his house arrest plea was denied. As Diddy will be spending Thanksgiving in jail, People reported the menu he will be offered on November 28. His breakfast at 6 AM will include fruit, cereal and breakfast pastries. His 11 AM lunch will include turkey roast or hot & sour tofu with sides like mashed potatoes, mixed vegetables, cranberry sauce, turkey gravy and dinner rolls served along with assorted holiday pie.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs will spend Thanksgiving in Brooklyn's Metropolitan Detention Center after his house arrest plea was denied.  As Diddy will be spending Thanksgiving in jail, People reported the menu he will be offered on November 28. His breakfast at 6 AM will include fruit, cereal and breakfast pastries. His 11 AM lunch will include turkey roast or hot & sour tofu with sides like mashed potatoes, mixed vegetables, cranberry sauce, turkey gravy and dinner rolls served along with assorted holiday pie.

title: Jack Smith files motion to dismiss Jan 6 case against Donald Trump before his inauguration
content: Special counsel Jack Smith moved to dismiss the four charges against President-elect Donald Trump related to the 2020 election plot. Citing longstanding DOJ policy, Smith argued that the Constitution requires dismissal before Trump's inauguration. The Justice Department maintains that sitting presidents cannot be prosecuted.
summary: Special counsel Jack Smith moved to dismiss the four charges against President-elect Donald Trump related to the 2020 election plot. Citing longstanding DOJ policy, Smith argued that the Constitution requires dismissal before Trump's inauguration. The Justice Department maintains that sitting presidents cannot be prosecuted.

title: Hindu and Sikh leaders join calls for assisted dying bill in UK to be opposed
